collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our practices in
relation to the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information.

This
includes information gathered through various authentication methods including
Google, Meta, and Apple.

Permissions and Data Usage

We request only the essential permissions for the functionality of our app,
which includes minimal data necessary for authentication purposes.

Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies

TourTeller uses cookies and similar technologies for enhancing user experience
and analyzing trends.

We do not knowingly
collect Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13.
